articles.title: Hwang Pyong So Leaves to Participate in Asian Games
articles.content:
Hwang Pyong So Leaves to Participate in Asian Games
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Hwang Pyong So, vice-chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, left here Saturday by air to participate in the closing ceremony of the 17th Asian Games.
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae and Kim Yang Gon, secretaries of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Tunisian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Tunisian President 
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Al Moncef Al Marzouki, president of the Republic of Tunisia, on September 23. 
					 The message said:
					
					 Extending warmest congratulations to Your Excellency on the occasion of the national day of the friendly DPRK, I sincerely wish Your Excellency good health and happiness and the Korean people bigger progress and development.
					
					 On this happy occasion I express my will to join Your Excellency in making efforts to boost the friendly and cooperative relations between our two countries in the interests of the two peoples.
					
					 Please accept my highest regards.

articles.title: Spokesman for DPRK FM Slams U.S. Frantic Anti-DPRK Campaign
articles.content:
Spokesman for DPRK FM Slams U.S. Frantic Anti-DPRK Campaign 
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK released the following statement Saturday:
					 The U.S. is becoming all the more pronounced in its hostile moves against the DPRK.
					
					 After ceaselessly staging war maneuvers against the DPRK from the outset of the year with huge armed forces and destructive weapons involved, the U.S. is intensifying its anti-DPRK operations, while totally denying its line, policies and social system.
					
					 This is clearly evidenced by the fact that the U.S. is running the whole gamut of invectives against the DPRK over its nuclear issue and "human rights" issue and all other matters.
					
					 On Sept. 23  U.S. Secretary of State Kerry held a "high-level meeting" with those toeing the U.S. line to  pull up the DPRK over its "human rights" issue at which he malignantly slandered its social system.  The U.S. assistant secretary of State for Democracy, Human Rights and Labor disclosed the U.S. intention to continue encouraging human scum to take the lead in the human rights racket against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. special representative for north Korea policy and the U.S. assistant secretary of State for East Asian and Pacific Affairs, in their official appearances slandered the DPRK's line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force and blustered that only when north Korea dismantles its nuclear weapons, can it achieve security and prosperity, while talking about its nuclear issue and "violation of international law."
					
					 Explicitly speaking once again, the DPRK was compelled to make a bold decision to have access to nuclear weapons due to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK, nuclear threat and strategy for stifling it for more than half a century.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear force serves a powerful treasured sword to protect the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of the nation under the prevailing situation and provides a sure guarantee for focusing efforts on preserving peace and security, building economy and improving the standard of the people's living.
					
					 The DPRK's line of simultaneously developing the two fronts serves as a banner for bolstering nuclear deterrence for self-defence to cope with the reckless nuclear threat and aggression by the U.S. and its followers and, on its basis, winning a decisive victory in building a thriving nation.
					
					 The nuclear deterrence of Songun Korea can never be given up and bartered for anything unless the U.S. hostile policy and nuclear threat are fundamentally terminated. The DPRK's line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force is the strategic line which should be permanently maintained to meet the supreme interests of the Korean revolution.
					
					 The U.S. act of pulling up the DPRK's nuclear deterrent and its line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force is a revelation of its sinister intention to swallow up the DPRK after forcing it to disarm itself. The U.S. frantic human rights racket is the heinous hostile moves to tarnish the image of the DPRK and destabilize it in a bid to bring down its social system.
					
					 It is highly illogical for the U.S., the chief criminal of international terrorism and human rights abuses and the world's biggest graveyard of human rights, to behave as if it has become a "human rights judge", while hardly settling its own problem. 
					
					 The U.S. human rights moves against the DPRK find their clear manifestation in that it persistently prevented the DPRK, party directly concerned with the "human rights issue" that was tabled during the UN General Assembly, from taking part in the meeting.
					
					 The DPRK has a will to strengthen the international cooperation in order to make its people enjoy better human rights, but it will never allow any attempt to use the "human rights" issue as leverage for putting pressure to bring down its social system. 
					
					 The discussion of denuclearization on the Korean Peninsula will be meaningless as the U.S. is set to bring down the DPRK's state system at any cost.
					
					 The DPRK agreed to work for the denuclearization of the peninsula because the U.S. expressed its will to respect the DPRK's sovereignty, stop the nuclear threat against it and coexist in peace.
					
					 What is left for the DPRK to do now is to take all possible measures for self-defense to cope with the U.S. hostile policy toward it.
					
					 The U.S. frantic racket of pulling up the DPRK's line, policies and social system out of its evil repugnancy and inveterate hostility will only harden the DPRK's faith and will to keep to the path chosen by it.

articles.title: Austrian Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Austrian Delegation Leaves 
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Austrian Center for International Studies led by Director Frances Mautner-Markhof left here for home Saturday.

articles.title: Anniversary of October 4 Declaration Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of October 4 Declaration Marked
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The Korean Committee for Solidarity with the World People and the National Peace Committee of Korea jointly sponsored round-table talks and a photo exhibition in Pyongyang on Friday to mark the 7th anniversary of the historic October 4 declaration.
					 Present there were leading officials and members of the committees and honorary guests of various social organizations.
					
					 The full text of the "Declaration for Development of North-South Relations and Peace and Prosperity" that was adopted at the 2007 north-south summit was read out to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The speakers said that the October 4 declaration, programme for implementing the June 15 joint declaration, got full support and warm welcome of the public at home and abroad as soon as it was published at the historic north-south summit in October 2007.
					
					 This proves that the declaration is a joint document signed by the north and the south, a document most correctly reflecting the desire and wishes of the Koreans, they noted, and went on:
					
					 The conservative forces totally negated the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration after seizing power in south Korea. This brought the north-south relations back to the days of mistrust and confrontation in the past.
					
					 Park Geun Hye, addressing the UN session recently, cried out for "the north's dismantlement of nuclear program" in a reckless effort to deprive the fellow countrymen in the north of treasured sword--nukes for protecting fellow countrymen and peace. Reciting a litany of "human rights issue in the north" she openly denied the inviolable socialist system in the DPRK and defamed the people's right to a genuine life. She went the lengths of shielding those involved in the anti-DPRK "balloon operation," calling them "defectors from the north". She even disclosed her ambition for achieving "unification through absorption" while referring to the lapse of 25 years since the pulling down of the Berlin Wall.
					
					 Whoever truly hopes for the improvement of the north-south ties and peace and stability of the nation should turn out to eliminate anti-reunification forces such as Park Geun Hye and implement at an early date north-south joint declarations that were agreed upon at the north-south summits.
					
					 The justice- and peace-loving people of the world extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just cause of achieving the reunification of the country and peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia on the basis of the north-south joint declarations, guided by the idea of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 The speakers underlined the need to conduct active joint actions demanding the implementation of the north-south joint declarations while keeping in close touch with friendship and solidarity organizations of various countries of the world and international organizations.
					
					 At the end of the round-table talks the participants looked round photos showing the historic north-south summit in 2007 and the Korean people working hard to implement the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Rice Harvesting Begins in DPRK
articles.content:
Rice Harvesting Begins in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Rice harvesting has begun on the co-op farms in the DPRK.
					 South Hwanghae Province stands as a frontrunner in the harvesting throughout the country by bringing into full play the advantages of sub-workteam management system.
					
					 Co-op farms in the province have overfulfilled their daily assignments, operating threshers at full capacity.
					
					 The same is true of other provinces.

articles.title: Papers Call for Opening New Phase of Independent Reunification
articles.content:
Papers Call for Opening New Phase of Independent Reunification 
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers here in their editorials dedicated to the seventh anniversary of the October 4 declaration call for opening a new phase of independent reunification under the banner of the north-south joint declarations. 
					 Rodong Sinmun says that the adoption of the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing the June 15 joint declaration, helped open a turning phase in the struggle of the Korean nation for independent reunification, peace and prosperity. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Over the past seven years the Korean nation keenly felt how the north-south joint declaration was dear to it amid unprecedentedly stern ordeals and has waged the nationwide patriotic struggle for firmly preserving it. 
					
					 The cause of independent reunification of Korea started and developed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il is being successfully carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 It is his firm faith and will to preserve and implement the three principles of national reunification and north-south declarations provided by the President and Kim Jong Il and build on this land a reunified prosperous and powerful nation envied by the world. 
					
					 All Koreans in the north, south and overseas should hold higher the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration despite the tense situation and desperate offensive of the anti-reunification forces. 
					
					 The north-south declarations are the most important documents for the north-south relations. Nothing can be put above them and nothing can substitute for them.
					
					 All Koreans should fully embody the idea of By Our Nation Itself enshrined in the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and reject outside forces. 
					
					 Minju Joson says the Koreans in the north will pool efforts with the south Koreans and overseas Koreans in the actions to foil all the anti-reunification moves of the U.S. and south Korean puppet group and thoroughly implement the north-south joint declarations under the banner of By Our Nation Itself and thus successfully carry out the behests of the President and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Building Independent Economy
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Building Independent Economy 
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- In order to maintain an independent stand, every country should build self-supporting economy, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 No country can expect any independence without increasing the independence of national economy, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is nothing but a daydream for a country to develop economy without making it self-supporting, no matter how ardently it aspires after independence and pursues justice and truth, 
					
					 If a country runs national economy with capital and efforts of others, it will be bound to depend on foreign forces for its economic development and loose its say and, in the long run, it will allow itself to fall in a moment.
					
					 As the imperialists are resorting to frantic moves to slap sanctions against other countries aspiring after independence, the issue of increasing the independence of national economy presents itself as a more urgent matter.
					
					 One of the important issues of achieving economic self-support is to train native cadres and scientific and technological talents and develop one's own science and technology.
					
					 Self-reliance is the basic principle which should be maintained to dynamically push ahead with the building of self-supporting national economy and lay the material and technological foundation of a country by believing in the strength of the people and relying on its locally available resources.
					
					 It is an essential requirement for ensuring economic self-support to boost economic and technological cooperation and South-South cooperation among developing countries.
					
					 Very enormous are manpower and economic and technological potentials of developing countries. If all these are effectively harnessed and used, it is possible to boost South-South cooperation and facilitate the building of self-supporting national economy and common development.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Discloses U.S. Purpose of Selling F-35s to S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Discloses U.S. Purpose of Selling F-35s to S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Recently, the south Korean puppet forces formally announced that it would purchase 40 F-35 fighters from the U.S.
					 Washington promised to transfer the technology of developing fighters to south Korea as a quid pro quo for its sale of F-35s to the latter.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					   Lurking behind this is an ulterior design of the U.S. to more zealously prod the south Korean puppet forces into escalating the confrontation with the DPRK in a bid to strain the situation into an extreme pitch and ignite the second Korean war.
					
					 There is another aim sought by Washington in selling F-35s to south Korea.
					
					 F-35 fighter is a multi-purpose stealth fighter with long-range flight. Its operation sphere covers areas far beyond the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 This means that its mission is not to conduct military operations over the peninsula only.
					
					 It is an objective of Washington to carry out its pivot-to-Asia-Pacific strategy by dint of its military muscle. As it considers the peninsula as an area of key importance, it seeks to stifle the DPRK by force of arms, contain its neighboring big powers and thus dominate the region.
					
					 Foreign media also comment that the ultimate aim sought by the U.S. in its sale of fighters to south Korea is to contain China, Russia and other countries near the peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. authorities would be well advised to bear in mind that their single action would invite ten, nay a hundred stronger counter-measures.

articles.title: U.S. Mulls Deploying More Aggressor Troops in S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Mulls Deploying More Aggressor Troops in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Department of the Army approved the deployment of the 3rd Battalion of the 8th Armored Regiment of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in Texas State in south Korea within this month under the pretext of rotation deployment, according to the south Korean newspaper Segye Ilbo on Thursday. 
					 It was reported that this was pursuant to the measure of the U.S. Department of Defense for readjusting the deployment of the U.S. forces overseas. 
					
					 Recently the U.S. imperialists are getting more frantic in arms buildup for a war against the DPRK as the days go by. 
					
					 Some days before, F-15Es were deployed in the U.S. air force base in Osan. The U.S. also deployed B-2 strategic nuclear bombers on Guam. 
					
					 The U.S. is getting busier with preparations for a war against the DPRK as evidenced by its stepped-up moves to deploy THAAD in south Korea. 
					
					 The above-said war moves of the U.S. go to clearly prove who is the arch criminal threatening peace by bringing clouds of a nuclear war to hang over Korea.

articles.title: S. Korean Lawmakers Call for Lifting "May 24 Steps" and Improving Relations between South and North
articles.content:
S. Korean Lawmakers Call for Lifting "May 24 Steps" and Improving Relations between South and North
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Lawmakers of the opposition parties of south Korea submitted the "resolution calling for lifting the May 24 steps and improving the relations between the south and the north" to the puppet National Assembly on Oct. 1, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The resolution urged the regime to lift the "May 24 steps" according to the desire of compatriots for the improvement of the relations between the south and the north.
					
					 It called for improving the relations between the south and the north through economic cooperation, social and cultural exchange, visits, etc.

articles.title: Implementation of North-South Joint Declaration Is Top Priority Task for Authorities: S. Korean Organization
articles.content:
Implementation of North-South Joint Declaration Is Top Priority Task for Authorities: S. Korean Organization 
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The Media Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration issued a statement on Oct. 1 on the occasion of the 7th anniversary of the October 4 declaration, according to the south Korean internet paper Thongil News.
					 The statement deplored that the present regime talked about the "termination of abnormal things", but nothing has been done properly in the fields of politics, economy, society and culture. 
					
					 The country's division into the south and the north is the most abnormal thing and it is the root cause of abnormal happenings in this land, the statement said, adding:
					
					 It is necessary to solve the issue of national division in order to root out them.
					
					 The October 4 declaration is the one for the development of the relations between the south and the north and peace and prosperity and a programme for implementing the June 15 joint declaration which promised reconciliation, cooperation, peace and reunification between the south and the north.
					
					 There is no reason to oppose the north and the south working hard to get reconciled and cooperate with each other and achieve the peaceful reunification. 
					
					  The regime should prove its will in action, not just paying lip service to the "termination of abnormal things".
					
					 It is the top priority task of the present regime to implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans' Organizations Denounce Park Geun Hye's Anti-reunification, Confrontation Remarks
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans' Organizations Denounce Park Geun Hye's Anti-reunification, Confrontation Remarks
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The Chinese Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration released a statement on Sept. 30 denouncing the anti-reunification and confrontation reckless remarks of Park Geun Hye.
					 It expressed irrepressible anger at Park Geun Hye who malignantly hurt the dignity and social system of the DPRK, incited confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north and cried out for cooperation in the anti-DPRK campaign in the international arena. It went on:
					
					 The flurry of malignant vitriol let loose by Park against the DPRK over its human rights issue is nothing but an undisguised revelation of her wild ambition for achieving "unification through absorption" and a declaration of war aimed to escalate the confrontation of the social systems in the north and the south. It is, at the same time, a blatant challenge to the desire of all Koreans for improved inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The DPRK opted for bolstering up its deterrence for self-defence to foil the vicious moves of the U.S. and its lackeys for aggression.
					
					 This just option can never change no matter what reckless remarks the enemies may let loose to threaten and pressurize the DPRK.
					
					 Park will face only a stern punishment by all Koreans if she continues running riot, backed by outside forces.

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Jong Un's Work Held in Germany
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Jong Un's Work Held in Germany
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- A seminar on supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" was held by the Franken Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Germany on Sept. 27 to mark the 69th       anniversary of the foundation of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The chief of the group praised leader Kim Jong Il for developing the WPK into the party of President Kim Il Sung and a genuine mother party serving the people with his outstanding ideology and theories and energetic leadership.
					
					 Kim Jong Un formulated the revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and consolidated the WPK to be a vanguard unit carrying forward and accomplishing the idea and cause of the preceding leaders, he noted.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: WPK Founding Anniversary Marked Abroad
articles.content:
WPK Founding Anniversary Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- A meeting and book and photo exhibition took place in Switzerland, a lecture in Indonesia and round-table talks in Ethiopia between Sept. 26 and 29 on the occasion of the 69th anniversary of the foundation of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Displayed at the venue of the book and photo exhibition were photos documenting the undying exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The exhibits included their works and other Korean books.
					
					 The chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee said in a speech:
					
					 The Juche idea is a guiding idea of the WPK founded by Kim Il Sung on Oct. 10, 1945.
					
					 The WPK consolidated the unity and cohesion of its ranks in thinking and purpose in every way under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It is now wisely led by Kim Jong Un, who is creditably carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Juche, the revolutionary cause of Songun pioneered by Kim Il Sung and advanced by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The DPRK serves as a beacon of the socialist movement.
					
					 The director of the P.T. Dwi Mitra Perkasa in Indonesia in a lecture on the subject "Ever-victorious WPK" said the WPK is shining as the most dignified and invincible party thanks to Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event held in Switzerland.

articles.title: Bulgarian Organization Lauds WPK's History
articles.content:
Bulgarian Organization Lauds WPK's History
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association released a special bulletin on Sept. 30 on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The bulletin carried several articles captioned "Laying a groundwork for founding a party," "Founding of the WPK" and "Path covered by the WPK".
					
					 They recalled that President Kim Il Sung laid a solid organizational and ideological groundwork for founding a party in the days of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and founded the WPK on Oct. 10, 1945 on this basis after the liberation of Korea.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The WPK has demonstrated victories and glory only for a long period since its foundation.
					
					 The history of the WPK is the one of leadership provided by the peerless great persons.
					
					 Kim Il Sung founded the party and laid a reliable groundwork for its development.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il firmly consolidated it to be a powerful guiding force of the revolutionary cause of Songun, true to the cause of the President and brought about a turning phase for building a thriving nation.
					
					 After Kim Jong Il suddenly passed away, the Korean people are holding Marshal Kim Jong Un in high esteem as the supreme leader of the party, state and army.
					
					 He is leading the WPK and the DPRK to victory despite the undisguised moves of the imperialist allied forces to stifle the DPRK.

articles.title: U.S. Forces' Withdrawal from S. Korea Demanded
articles.content:
U.S. Forces' Withdrawal from S. Korea Demanded
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization made public a statement on Sept. 29 in demand of the withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea.
					 The U.S. forces' withdrawal is the unanimous desire of all Koreans, the statement said, referring to the U.S. imperialists' illegal occupation of south Korea after the Second World War.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The U.S. troops in south Korea are a stumbling block lying in the way of Korea's reunification.
					
					 The Korean people aspiring after reunification are strongly demanding the immediate withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea.
					
					 The Korean people's cause of national reunification which dynamically advanced under the wise guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il is given steady continuity by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization joins the peace-loving progressive mankind in demanding the earliest possible pullback of the U.S. forces from south Korea so that the Korean people may achieve the reunification of the country by their own efforts.

articles.title: Korea Is Sure to Be Reunified: British Organizations
articles.content:
Korea Is Sure to Be Reunified: British Organizations
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on Sept. 29 on the occasion of the 7th anniversary of the historic October 4 declaration.
					 The statement said that the October 4 declaration provided thanks to the tireless efforts of leader Kim Jong Il is the most vivid expression of his noble patriotism.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The south Korean fascist authorities are perpetrating acts of treachery, persistently negating the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 The DPRK made proposals for dialogue and reconciliation under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 However, the south Korean puppet forces are becoming evermore undisguised in their anti-DPRK campaign while chilling the sincere proposals made by the DPRK. Park Geun Hye cried out for "unification through absorption" even at UN as part of smear campaign against the DPRK.
					
					 The statement fully supported the south Korean people in their actions to implement the October 4 declaration and the spirit of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 It expressed belief that Korea would surely be reunified under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Official Visits to Soviet Union Marked in Belarus
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Official Visits to Soviet Union Marked in Belarus
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Events took place in Minsk, Belarus on Oct. 1 to mark the 65th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's first official visit to the Soviet Union and the 30th anniversary of his official visit to it in 1984.
					 A photo exhibition opened at the history museum of Minsk City under the co-sponsorship of the Communist Parties-the Communist Party of the Soviet Union and the Communist Party of Belarus.
					
					 Displayed there were photos documenting the exploits of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were works of the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu and other Korean books and photos and art pieces showing the true picture of Songun Korea.
					
					 Present there on invitation were officials of the Communist Parties-the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Belarus, the history museum and other officials concerned, masses and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Moscow.
					
					 Taysaev, first vice-chairman of the Council of the Communist Parties-the Communist Party of the Soviet Union who is also secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, made an opening address to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The speakers referred to the opening of the exhibition under the deep care of Kim Jong Un, saying that the exhibition would offer the Belarusian people an opportunity to know better about the exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They noted they would make every effort for the development of the friendly relations between the Communist Party of Belarus and the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Its participants went round the exhibition before watching Korean documentary "History of Eternal Friendship."
					
					 Meanwhile, there was a seminar on the theme of "History of friendship" at the history museum under the sponsorship of the Minsk City Committee of the Communist Party of Belarus.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Letter Posted on Website of DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Letter Posted on Website of DR Congo
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- "Young People, Be Vanguard Fighters Unfailingly Faithful to the Party's Revolutionary Cause of Songun", a letter sent by supreme leader Kim Jong Un to those attending the Fourth Conference of Primary Officials of Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League on September 18, Juche 103 (2014), was posted by the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo on its website on Sept. 29.
					 The letter recalled that the Korean youth covered a glorious path, glorifying the annals of the revolution with heroic feats and proud victories under the wise guidance and warm loving care of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It also clarified the tasks and ways for the Korean youth to creditably perform their role as the young vanguard of the party in the on-going historical advance.

articles.title: Parten de Pyongyang Hwang Pyong So y su comitiva hacia Inchon
articles.content:
Parten de Pyongyang Hwang Pyong So y su comitiva hacia Inchon
						
Pyongyang, 4 de octubre (ACNC) -- Para participar en la ceremonia de clausura de los XVII Juegos Asiaticos, el vicemariscal del Ejercito Popular de Corea Hwang Pyong So, vicepresidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC partio el dia 4 por via aerea de esta capital.
					Le acompanan los secretarios del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Ryong Hae y Kim Yang Gon.

articles.title: MINREX denuncia maniobras anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
articles.content:
MINREX denuncia maniobras anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
						
Pyongyang, 4 de octubre (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 4 la siguiente declaracion:
					Se tornan mas abiertas las maniobras de EE.UU. contra la RPDC.
					
					EE.UU., que desde los primeros dias de este ano perpetro incesantemente los ejercicios de guerra agresiva contra la RPDC movilizando las inmensas fuerzas armadas y equipos mortiferos, recurre a la campana anti-RPDC negando totalmente la linea, la politica y el regimen de la RPDC.
					
					Lo muestra concentradamente el hecho de que en estos dias, EE.UU. difama perversamente la RPDC acusandola de problema nuclear, el de DDHH y otros asuntos infundados.
					
					El 23 de septiembre, Kerry, secretario de Estado norteamericano, al acusarla del problema de DDHH  calumnio  cruelmente en la "reunion de alto nivel" de las fuerzas satelites el regimen de la RPDC, mientras el asistente del secretario de Estado norteamericano para democracia, DDHH y trabajo dijo abiertamente que seguira instigando a las escorias humanas puestas a la cabeza de la campana de DDHH contra la RPDC.
					
					Por otra parte, el delegado especial para la politica sobre el Norte de Corea y el asistente del secretario para Asia Oriental y el Pacifico del Departamento de Estado norteamericano, en la audiencia publica acusaron la RPDC de problema nuclear y "violacion de derecho internacional" y calumniaron la linea de la RPDC por el desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de las fuerzas armadas nucleares diciendo que al abandonar sus armas nucleares la RPDC podria lograr la seguridad y la prosperidad.
					
					Volvemos a expresar en claro que la decision de posesion de las armas nucleares de la RPDC es un producto inevitable de la politica hostil, la amenaza nuclear y la estrategia de aplastamiento de EE.UU. que perdura mas de medio siglo.
					
					Las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC son las poderosas espadas para defender la soberania del pais y la dignidad de la nacion frente a la situacion dada y la firme garantia para mantener la paz y la seguridad y concentrar las fuerzas en la construccion economica y en la mejora de vida del pueblo.
					
					La linea de desarrollo paralelo de la RPDC es la bandera para fortalecer mas su disuasivo nuclear frente a las imprudentes amenazas nucleares y las maquinaciones agresivas de EE.UU. y sus fuerzas satelites y lograr en la construccion de un Estado prospero la victoria decisiva basandose en este disuasivo.
					
					Mientras no se eliminan la politica de hostilidad y la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. el disuasivo nuclear de la Corea del Songun, no se puede abandonar jamas ni cambiar con nada y la linea de desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de las fuerzas armadas nucleares es la estrategica a ser tomada permanentemente partiendo de los intereses supremos de la revolucion coreana.
					
					La calumnia de EE.UU. al disuasivo nuclear y la linea de desarrollo paralelo de la RPDC es una expresion del malsano intento de desarmarla, y su fanatico alboroto de DDHH es un acto hostil tendente a manchar la imagen de la RPDC y desintegrarla desde el interior y derrocar su regimen. 
					
					EE.UU., autor del terrorismo internacional y de la violacion de DDHH, tiene la mala fama mundial como infierno de DDHH. Sin embargo, actua ridiculamente como si fuera el "juez de DDHH". 
					
					La esencia de la campana de DDHH anti-RPDC de EE.UU. se ha evidenciado en haber impedido la participacion de la RPDC en la reunion para discutir el problema de "DDHH" de ella durante la reciente Asamblea General de la ONU. 
					
					Tenemos la voluntad de fortalecer la cooperacion internacional para fomentar mas el disfrute de DDHH de las masas populares, pero no toleraremos ni un minimo intento de utilizar el tema de "DDHH" como un medio de presion para derrocar nuestro regimen. 
					
					Puesto que EE.UU. se desespera por derrocar a toda costa el regimen estatal norcoreano, sera insignificante la discusion sobre la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Habiamos acordado la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana porque EE.UU. aclaro la voluntad de respetar la soberania de la RPDC, dejar de ejercer la amenaza nuclear sobre esta y coexistir en paz con ella. 
					
					Ahora tenemos solo la necesidad de tomar irrestrictamente todas las medidas de autodefensa posibles frente a la politica norteamericana de hostilidad a la RPDC. 
					
					Cuanto mas EE.UU. con veto patologico y hostilidad acostumbrada sobre la RPDC arme alboroto acusando nuestras lineas y politicas y nuestro regimen, se redoblaran mas nuestra conviccion y voluntad de marchar a pasos firmes por el camino optado por nosotros mismos.

articles.title: Se celebra en RPDC el dia de publicacion de Declaracion del 4 de Octubre
articles.content:
Se celebra en RPDC el dia de publicacion de Declaracion del 4 de Octubre
						
Pyongyang, 4 de octubre (ACNC) -- Bajo los coauspicios del Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con los Pueblos del Mundo y del Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz, tuvieron lugar este sabado en esta capital la mesa redonda y la exhibicion fotografica dedicadas al 7o aniversario de la publicacion de la historica Declaracion del 4 de Octubre.
					Asistieron los funcionarios directivos y los miembros de las dos entidades mencionadas y los huespedes honorarios de varias entidades sociales. 
					
					En la mesa redonda se dio lectura al texto integral de la Declaracion para el Desarrollo de las Relaciones Norte-Sur, la Paz y la Prosperidad, aprobada en 2007 en la Cumbre Norte-Sur y hubo intervenciones. 
					
					Los oradores recordaron que tan pronto como se publicara en octubre de 2007 en la historica Cumbre Norte-Sur la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre como programa y guia de accion para la ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, causo gran apoyo y aplausos dentro y  fuera del pais, lo cual demostro claramente que este documento refleja mas correctamente la aspiracion de la nacion coreana. 
					
					Al volver a tomar el poder, las fuerzas conservadoras surcoreanas niegan totalmente la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, debido a lo cual las relaciones intercoreanas retrocedieron al tiempo pasado de desconfianza y enfrentamiento, revelaron.
					
					Denunciaron que hace poco, la mandataria surcoreana Park Geun-hye actuo con imprudencia en la arena de la ONU insistiendo en la "renuncia nuclear del Norte de Corea" por eliminar hasta las armas nucleares de la parte connacional que defiende a la nacion y preserva la paz, niega abiertamente el sagrado regimen socialista de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea acusandola de la "situacion de DDHH" e insultando los verdaderos derechos  de vivir y ampara como "fugitivos norcoreanos" a las escorias humanas movilizadas en la "operacion de globos" anti-RPDC, y demuestra sin escrupulos hasta la ambicion de "unificacion mediante la absorbicion" hablando de los 25 anos de desintegracion de la barrera de Berlin. 
					
					Todos los que desean de veras la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas y la paz y estabilidad de la nacion, deben levantarse para eliminar a las fuerzas anti-reunificacion como Park Geun-hye y ejecutar cuanto antes las declaraciones conjuntas intercoreanas aprobadas en las Cumbres Norte-Sur, puntualizaron.
					
					Los pueblos amantes de la paz y justicia del mundo expresan el apoyo y la solidaridad con la justa causa del pueblo coreano por reunificar el pais segun el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" y las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur y preservar la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del Nordeste Asiatico, afirmaron. 
					
					Subrayaron la necesidad de desarrollar con mas dinamismo las acciones conjuntas para demandar la ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur en estrecha relacion con las organizaciones internacionales y las entidades de amistad y solidaridad en todas las partes del mundo. 
					
					Terminada la mesa redonda, los participantes vieron las fotos que muestran la historica Cumbre Norte-Sur celebrada en 2007 y los esfuerzos del pueblo coreano por la ejecucion de la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre.

articles.title: Tenistas de mesa de RPDC ganan medalla de oro en el doble mixto
articles.content:
Tenistas de mesa de RPDC ganan medalla de oro en el doble mixto
Inchon, 3 de octubre (corresponsal de ACNC) -- Kim Hyok Bong y Kim Jong de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ganaron la medalla de oro en el doble mixto de la competencia de tenis de mesa de los XVII Juegos Asiaticos.
					Al ganar facilmente en las eliminatorias, ellos vencieron en los octavos de la final a sus rivales surcoreanos por 3:1, en el cuarto a los chinos por 3:2 y en la semifinal a los japoneses por 4:1.
					
					En la final ellos competieron con los de Hong Kong de China, ocasion en la cual les doblegaron por 4:1, obteniendo asi la medalla de oro.
					
					El mismo dia, las tenistas de mesa Kim Jong y Kim Hye Song ocuparon el tercer lugar en el doble femenino y Kim Un Hyang, en el salto al agua del trampolin fijo de 10 m de altura.
